title: Update Needed in Javadoc for Constructor Image(Device, ImageData)
description: Bug 44164 - Update needed in Javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData).
OB: The Javadoc for the constructor Image(Device, ImageData) is missing crucial information.
EB: This should be added to the Javadoc to provide a complete and accurate description of the constructor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue (note that the ImageData is successfully created, it is Image that is throwing the exception), use the following steps:
1. Import org.eclipse.swt.graphics.
2. Create an instance of ImageData with appropriate parameters.
3. Attempt to create an Image using the constructor Image(Device, ImageData).
